edu.uga.cs.rentaride.persistence

Interface PersistenceLayer


  • public interface PersistenceLayer
    This is the interface to the Persistence Layer subsystem of the Rent-A-Ride system. Each entity class has three types of operations: restore, store, and delete. The store operation does an update, if the given argument has already been stored previously (i.e., it is already persistent).

    • Method Detail

      • restoreAdministrator

        java.util.Iterator<Administrator> restoreAdministrator(Administrator modelAdministrator)
                                                       throws RARException
        Restore all Administrator objects that match attributes of the model Administrator.
        Parameters:
        modelAdministrator - the model Administrator; if null is provided, all Administrator objects will be returned
        Returns:
        an Iterator of the located Administrator objects
        Throws:
        RARException - in case an error occurred during the restore operation

      • storeAdministrator

        void storeAdministrator(Administrator administrator)
                        throws RARException
        Store a given Administrator object in the persistent data store. If the Administrator object to be stored is already persistent, the persistent object in the data store is updated.
        Parameters:
        administrator - the Administrator to be stored
        Throws:
        RARException - in case an error occurred during the store operation

      • deleteAdministrator

        void deleteAdministrator(Administrator administrator)
                         throws RARException

        Parameters:
        administrator - the Administrator to be deleted
        Throws:
        RARException - in case an error occurred during the delete operation

      • restoreRentARideConfig

        RentARideConfig restoreRentARideConfig()
                                       throws RARException
        Restore the RentARideConfig object. The RentARideConfig is a singleton class, so there is only one object to restore.
        Returns:
        RentARideConfig the RentARideConfig configuration singleton object
        Throws:
        RARException - in case an error occurred during the delete operation

      • storeRentalComment
